# Even

<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Excel EVEN(number): Rounds the given number up to the nearest even integer.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `EVEN`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
